Posts.Content: Dec 4, 2006 03:28AM skatertaxi wrote: Maybe they can try lowering the dose. After my first TAC I was in bed for almost 3 weeks to weak to do anything. I was even to weak to sit in a chair. My DH had to take me to the bathroom as I couldn't even walk down the hall. They lowered my taxotere by 20% and it made all the difference in the world.
Posts.Title: Is Anyone Starting Chemo In Aug 06 Mamasj cheryl66

Posts.Content: Dec 23, 2006 02:40AM skatertaxi wrote: Cheryl, I asked my Dr. when do you start counting and he said the date of diagnosis. My date is July 7 2006 so I am already 1/2 way to my 1 year anniversary.
